world class breakfast, lunch & dinner
awarded with 3 michelin stars

World class chef André Vuiton is main cook and menus creator in our "ShellEyes" Restaurant, in our top level penthouse.
Bringing the best food from all parts of the world
Breakfast is the most important meal of the day - it's doesn't mean that it can't be delicious ...
Millet, Chia, Almond Milk, Caramelized Bananas, Toasted Almond, Cinnamon, Brown Sugar

Two Eggs, Crispy Potato, Tomato Jam, House Made Sausage or Bacon, Toasted House Made Bread
We are serving for your new gastronomic pleasures - every dish gets unique and total commitment from our chef and it's team of cooks.
